mapper.select: SELECT NO , ID , PWD , COMPANY_NAME , COMPANY_ADDRESS , NAME , PHONE , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , COMPANY_NUM , STATUS_YN , QUIT_YN FROM CORPORATE_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id} AND QUIT_YN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYMENT WHERE CORP_NO = #{corpNo} AND DELETE_YN = 'N' AND DEADLINE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT EMP.NO , CORP_NO , TITLE , DEADLINE , ENROLL_DATE , A.CNT FROM EMPLOYMENT EMP LEFT JOIN ( SELECT EMP_NO, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM APPLY GROUP BY EMP_NO ) A ON A.EMP_NO = EMP.NO WHERE CORP_NO = #{corpNo} AND DELETE_YN = 'N' AND DEADLINE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYMENT SET DELETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE NO = #{no}
